ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands

Class SteerCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands.ShipCommand
      • ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands.SteerCommand

  • public class SteerCommand
extends ShipCommand
    A command to cause a ship to change its course by the amount indicated. Positive values adjust counter-clockwise; negative values adjust clockwise.

    Note: This does not adjust your ship's orientation to match, it only effects your movement direction. If you have no velocity, this command will have no effect.

    Note: This command can be toggled with the optional second parameter to NOT block the ship, this is useful for performing more complex maneuvers.

    Since:
    1.0
